page.title: 15Merdon Manor (6)
page.content: Manorial Lands ============== The manor has always been part of the Hursley Park Estate , and thus shared the Estate's lands . When Mr.Jeffrey Smith bought it in 1981 it had 45 Acres of its own land , centred in the immediate vicinity . 12 Acres of this is woodland , for the most part where the old drive used to come in . 5 Acres remain as ornamental gardens . The rest (28 Acres) is simply left as meadowland . Stables and barns have been erected , but the land is mostly used to exercise horses .
